review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: What intention did you create yesterday? Give yourself credit for reflecting on it
  throughout the day. Remember why you are striving to be on The Path!
quote:
"When you don't shine a light on a new thought, behavior or pattern, your automatic behavior reinforces old
  brain circuits" Stephen Sideroff, PhD

step_of_the_day.title:
Notice old messages that keep your old brain circuits going strong. You are either moving forward or
  backward - choose forward (Pillars #1-9)
step_of_the_day.content:
Yesterday's lesson was about how to create positive change in your behavior, your life, and your brain.
  Throughout your day there are many choice points. Moments in which the new pattern/intention can be
  spotlighted and chosen to strengthen new brain circuits. Unfortunately, without being present to be aware
  and to choose the new intention, the tendency is to follow old patterns and thereby reinforce your old brain
  pathways.At each choice point in your day you will either strengthen a new brain circuit - if you are aware and hold
  to your intention - or reinforce the old pattern, by following old habits

action_step:
Identify the intention you are working to reinforce. Remind yourself to review this intention throughout the
  day. At the same time, make an effort to notice when you take the old path (this will probably occur after
  the fact; but that's still progress).
journal_entry: What are some of your strongest habits, or old patterns that don't serve you?
